```{r}
library(pgxRpi)

```


```{r}
freq <- pgxLoader(type='frequency', output='pgxseg', filters = 'NCIT:C9245',
                  codematches = T)

```



```{r}
head(freq$data$'NCIT:C4025')

```


## Step4: Visualize data

### By genome

```{r,fig.width=12,fig.height=6}
pgxFreqplot(freq)

```



## Step5: Analyse the data

p links, q rechts

According to the plot, we can see frequent gains on chromosome 1q,8q,16p,20q

and frequent losses on 1p,8p,11q,16q,17p
